items.title: Thunderbolts*
items.overview: An irreverent team-up featuring depressed assassin Yelena Belova alongside the MCU’s least anticipated band of misfits.

items.title: Captain America: Brave New World
items.overview: After meeting with newly elected U.S. President Thaddeus Ross, Sam finds himself in the middle of an international incident. He must discover the reason behind a nefarious global plot before the true mastermind has the entire world seeing red.

items.title: Deadpool & Wolverine
items.overview: A listless Wade Wilson toils away in civilian life with his days as the morally flexible mercenary, Deadpool, behind him. But when his homeworld faces an existential threat, Wade must reluctantly suit-up again with an even more reluctant Wolverine.

items.title: The Marvels
items.overview: Carol Danvers, aka Captain Marvel, has reclaimed her identity from the tyrannical Kree and taken revenge on the Supreme Intelligence. But unintended consequences see Carol shouldering the burden of a destabilized universe. When her duties send her to an anomalous wormhole linked to a Kree revolutionary, her powers become entangled with that of Jersey City super-fan Kamala Khan, aka Ms. Marvel, and Carol’s estranged niece, now S.A.B.E.R. astronaut Captain Monica Rambeau.

items.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
items.overview: Peter Quill, still reeling from the loss of Gamora, must rally his team around him to defend the universe along with protecting one of their own.

items.title: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
items.overview: Super-Hero partners Scott Lang and Hope van Dyne, along with with Hope's parents Janet van Dyne and Hank Pym, and Scott's daughter Cassie Lang, find themselves exploring the Quantum Realm.

items.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
items.overview: Queen Ramonda, Shuri, M’Baku, Okoye and the Dora Milaje fight to protect their nation from intervening world powers in the wake of King T’Challa’s death.

items.title: Thor: Love and Thunder
items.overview: After his retirement is interrupted by Gorr the God Butcher, a galactic killer who seeks the extinction of the gods, Thor enlists allies to stop him before it’s too late.

items.title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
items.original_title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
items.overview: Doctor Strange, with the help of mystical allies both old and new, traverses the mind-bending and dangerous alternate realities of the Multiverse.

items.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
items.overview: Peter Parker is unmasked and no longer able to separate his normal life from being a super-hero. When he asks Doctor Strange for help, things become even more dangerous.

items.title: Eternals
items.overview: The Eternals are a team of ancient aliens who have been living on Earth in secret for thousands of years. Forced to reunite against mankind’s most ancient enemy, the Deviants.

items.title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
items.original_title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
items.overview: Shang-Chi must confront the past he thought he left behind when he is drawn into the web of the mysterious Ten Rings organization.

items.title: Black Widow
items.overview: Natasha Romanoff, also known as Black Widow, confronts the darker parts of her ledger when a dangerous conspiracy with ties to her past arises.

items.title: Spider-Man: Far From Home
items.overview: Peter Parker and his friends go on a summer trip to Europe. However, they soon find themselves facing mysterious creatures wreaking havoc across the continent.

items.title: Avengers: Endgame
items.overview: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins. The Avengers must assemble once more to undo Thanos' actions and restore order.

items.title: Captain Marvel
items.overview: Carol Danvers becomes one of the universe's most powerful heroes when Earth is caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien races.

items.title: Ant-Man and the Wasp
items.overview: Just when his time under house arrest is about to end, Scott Lang is recruited by Dr. Hank Pym for a time-sensitive rescue mission in the Quantum Realm.

items.title: Avengers: Infinity War
items.overview: As the Avengers and their allies continue to protect the world from threats too large for any one hero to handle, a new danger emerges: Thanos.

items.title: Black Panther
items.overview: King T'Challa returns home to the technologically advanced African nation of Wakanda to serve as his country's new leader.

items.title: Thor: Ragnarok
items.overview: Thor is imprisoned on the other side of the universe and must race to get back to Asgard to stop Ragnarok, the destruction of his world.
